outline:
1. to boil, cook, bake, roast, ripen, grow ripe
    1. (Qal)
      1. to boil, cook
      2. to grow ripe, ripen
    2. (Piel)
      1. to boil
      2. to cook
    3. (Pual)
      1. to be boiled
      2. to be sodden
    4. (Hiphil)
      1. to ripen
      2. ripen, brought to ripeness
kjv_def: bake, boil, bring forth, roast, seethe, sod (be sodden).
strongs_def: properly, to boil up; hence, to be done in cooking; figuratively to ripen
